reviewText:
Very inspiring message, I am lucky to be already practicing a lot to help reduce, conserve and help others be more aware of our impact on this beautiful world. It was a good reminder for me thanks you, and now another resources for me to share with others young and old.

I feel awake and ready to help create a change of life for a sustainable living.
Good material presented in a way that I can relate with.
Excellent movie! Everyone should take the time to watch it :) it will change the way you live, eat & breathe.
Great movie, thankfully lacks the intensity of "An Inconvenient Truth" while still making the point of the urgent need for a change in our cultural "dream"

Humans are still on the wrong path...I watch documentary after documentary and the problem is, the
 people who need to watch them are the ones who are too ignorant and stupid to watch...
 Humans,  gross humans...not all but most are still half asleep, living their mundane lives, taking up
 space on the Planet.
 Sad...very sad.
If you ever wondered "but what can I do?" Here's your chance. Together we can be an amazing world balance.
I dragged my heals to watch AND I AM so glad I finally watched it !!! Awesomesauce !!!
An excellent introduction to The Pachamama Alliance and the wonderful stand they take for our world and the environment.

This makes it unequivocally clear that ALL HOPE IS GONE for maintaining an environment that sustains human life on Earth WITHOUT my active engagement in changing the worldview that extracts and exploits natural resources in denial of the predictable consequences.
I wish these were the things being taught in schools.

Awakening the Dreamer is an introduction.  Gives hope for the future with ongoing courses that help motivate & lift the spirit of individuals.  If I had the money, I would take the entire course and join an active, positive group that will change how you look at humanity and our planet.  Uplifting and enlightening online introduction to a world wide organization.  This is a growing organization of souls that reaches out to everyone. Helps individuals feel like they are not alone and remind us that we are inter-connected with everything around us. They do not exclude other faiths and they are focused on the survival of our planet and our species.  They even except the poor and from what I was told, you can give what you can afford.  This was a wonderful gift from a friend and I plan of passing on the gift to others.
In case you go along with day to day and don't think about the rest of the world this video is a wake up call.
A must see symposium that touches the heart and encourages action!!
Important information for for our society. Be the change.
